## Type of Change

- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change that fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change that adds functionality)

- [ ] Refactoring (no functional changes, no API changes)
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] CI/CD or build configuration change
- [ ] Dependency update
- [ ] Other (please describe):

## Checklist

- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have added/updated tests that prove my fix or feature works
- [ ] All new and existing tests pass (`npm test` / `pnpm test`)
- [ ] Linting passes with no new warnings (`npm run lint`)
- [ ] Type checking passes (`tsc --noEmit`)
- [ ] I have updated documentation where necessary
- [ ] I have checked for and documented any database migrations
- [ ] I have considered backward compatibility
- [ ] Breaking changes are documented in the description above
